name: Oven-Roasted Italian Salmon with Caesar Salad
author: Csilla Brimer
summary: A sweet-smoky, moist, oven-roasted salmon texture served on a bed of delicious and refreshing Caesar salad.
ingredients: 1 head lettuce, chopped, or as needed
½ cup croutons, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking pan with aluminum foil
Mix coconut sugar, paprika, orange zest, oregano, cinnamon, and sea salt together in a small bowl
Add 1 tablespoon olive oil and mix well
Rub salmon evenly with the mixture; place fish on the prepared baking pan
Roast in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 15 minutes
Mix vinegar, 1 tablespoon olive oil, mustard, garlic, and salt together in a small bowl
Pour dressing over the lettuce and mix well
Add croutons and place the salmon on top
